name: Audacious Inquiry
description:
Audacious Inquiry (Ai) is a health information technology and policy company. We are leading the charge to make health care smarter and more connected.
Our nationally-recognized consultants work with government, private, and non-profit organizations to rethink how health information is shared, managed, leveraged, and protected. We have built a reputation for taking on complex technical challenges by working collaboratively among our strategy, policy, and engineering teams.
